General.Name: Bona Film Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Bona Film Group Limited engages in the film production and distribution, and cinema management and projection business in China. It operates 80 theaters with 662 screens in Beijing, Shanghai, Hangzhou, Ningbo, Chongqing, and other cities. The company also offers advertising services. Bona Film Group Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China. Bona Film Group Co., Ltd. engages in film and television production, film and television distribution, cinema investment, cinema management, advertising and marketing, and artist brokerage. The company is based in Beijing, China.

6.Name: Ms. Ming Fang  Huang
6.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
